questions.question: Which reinforcement arrangement is ideal for a short column subjected to biaxial bending?

answers.a: Reinforcement concentrated at two opposite faces
answers.b: Symmetrically distributed reinforcement at all four sides
answers.c: Reinforcement provided only along the major bending axis

questions.question: The term 'interaction curve' in column design represents:

answers.b: The relationship between axial load and bending moment
answers.c: The variation of moment along the column height
